title: Honey Soy Duck Noodles
directions: Prepare Luv-A-Duck Ready Roasted Honey Soy Duck Legs as per pack instructions and slice thinly.
Heat oil in the wok over a medium heat and saut√© the ginger and broccolini 1 minute, stir in the combined tomato sauce, lemon zest & juice, soy sauce, rice wine and chilli. Bring to the boil.
Toss in the noodles and stir-fry 1 minute.
Serve stir fry noodles in a bowl and top with sliced Luv-A-Duck Honey Roast Duck. Garnish with toasted sesame seeds and coriander leaves.
ingredients: 2 Luv-A-Duck, Ready Roasted Honey Soy Duck Legs
2 tsp fresh ginger, peeled and grated
